text: Monkerton is a proposed railway station in the hamlet of Monkerton, near Exeter, Devon, England, and is proposed as part of the "Devon Metro" plans. It would be built at a later date to the other proposed stations and is to be built between Polsloe Bridge and Digby & Sowton. ==References== Category:Proposed railway stations in England Category:Transport in Exeter
title: Monkerton railway station
